summary: This bill, S.793, amends the Commander John Scott Hannon Veterans Mental Health Care Improvement Act of 2019. It modifies and reauthorizes the Staff Sergeant Parker Gordon Fox Suicide Prevention Grant Program. Key changes include removing references to the President’s Roadmap Task Force, increasing the maximum grant amount, adding new measures and metrics, requiring annual briefings for local VA medical center personnel, extending the program's duration to September 30, 2028, and increasing funding for fiscal years 2026-2028. Additionally, the bill updates the eligible individuals subsection.
